Dr. Toast Live @ Burning Man: The Polarium
posted August 21, 2007 in shows

Thursday, August 30 2007, 3 am (Friday morning) - Dr. Toast reprises his 2005 performance at the Solarium! For 2007, The Polarium is a 30-foot igloo-shaped geodesic dome with eight channels of 3-D spacialized sound, located at Boreal near 2:00, where "a chilled out beat will provide just the right mind relaxation to allow the bears to recoup and fight another day against the elements."Â  Be sure to also catch the Dr. on Tuesday Night!
